trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZJ003_04339_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The overwrought dragon can no longer find it in himself to relax.
TEXT_AKTKZJ003_04339_TODO_00<tab>Scout the area around Reah Tahra.
TEXT_AKTKZJ003_04339_DRAGON04339_000_000<tab>Hark! The grinding and shuddering of steel bodies... The metal, it cometh!
TEXT_AKTKZJ003_04339_DRAGON04339_000_001<tab>...Thou hearest naught? Mayhaps thy species hath not the sensitivity... Yet the machines come nevertheless.
TEXT_AKTKZJ003_04339_DRAGON04339_000_002<tab>Seek a vantage from which even thou mayest witness their dread approach...then hearken unto my words, and flee.
TEXT_AKTKZJ003_04339_DRAGON04339_000_003<tab>Flee, stranger, shouldst thou value thy life.
TEXT_AKTKZJ003_04339_DRAGON04339_000_010<tab>Thou art returned... What didst thou ken?
TEXT_AKTKZJ003_04339_DRAGON04339_000_012<tab>...Perhaps thou speakest in sooth. That mechanical cacophony plagueth me without cease... Though I swear 'tis clearer now than it hath ever been.
TEXT_AKTKZJ003_04339_DRAGON04339_000_013<tab>Should this be naught but mine own fears, returned fiercer with each coming... I know not how to quit myself of them.
TEXT_AKTKZJ003_04339_A1_000_001<tab>Find strength in your comrades, and together overcome your fears.
TEXT_AKTKZJ003_04339_A1_000_002<tab>You must embrace your fear to truly understand it.
TEXT_AKTKZJ003_04339_A1_000_003<tab>You should fear nothing, as I do.
TEXT_AKTKZJ003_04339_DRAGON04339_100_015<tab>Thou art strong. Had my kin sought what thou hast found, perhaps our star would have met a different fate...
TEXT_AKTKZJ003_04339_DRAGON04339_000_015<tab>Thou art strong. Would that my kin had sought what thou hast found...
TEXT_AKTKZJ003_04339_DRAGON04339_000_016<tab>...Though there may yet be time. Naught can alter history's course, but the future awaiteth still. I thank thee for thine insight, courageous one.
